workLog.action: Analyzed recently modified files from last 5 commits
workLog.result: Identified 4 files with complexity and duplication opportunities

workLog.action: Simplified PR classification logic in Invoke-PRMaintenance.ps1
workLog.result: Reduced cyclomatic complexity from 15 to 10. Eliminated 3 duplicate switch statements. Added early exit pattern.
Fixed test regression. All 54 Pester tests pass. Array unrolling prevention maintained.

workLog.action: Flattened CodeQL alert fetching in invoke_precommit_security.py
workLog.result: Reduced nesting depth from 5 to 3. Used list comprehension for alert creation.

workLog.action: Replaced nested ternary with explicit if/elif/else
workLog.result: Improved readability per CLAUDE.md guidance (avoid nested ternaries)

workLog.action: Made severity estimation explicit in invoke_security_retrospective.py
workLog.result: Clearer default case handling with explicit if/elif/else
Documented all improvements, metrics, and lessons learned

workLog.action: Ran Pester tests to verify functionality preservation
workLog.result: Tests completed in 5.1s. Tests Passed: 54, Failed: 0, Skipped: 0

deliverables.description: Simplified PR classification logic. Reduced complexity 33%, eliminated duplication 67%.
Flattened CodeQL fetching. Reduced nesting 40%, replaced nested ternary.
Made severity estimation explicit with clear default handling.
Complete documentation of simplification patterns, metrics, and lessons learned.

decisions.decision: Extract common reason calculation in PR classification to eliminate duplication
decisions.rationale: Three duplicate switch statements violated DRY principle. Single calculation point improves maintainability.
decisions.impact: Reduced cyclomatic complexity 15â†’10. Easier to maintain reason logic in one place.

decisions.decision: Replace nested ternary with explicit if/elif/else for CodeQL status
decisions.rationale: CLAUDE.md explicitly recommends avoiding nested ternaries. Explicit conditionals are clearer.
decisions.impact: Improved readability without performance impact. Easier to debug and extend.

decisions.decision: Use list comprehension for CodeQL alert creation
decisions.rationale: More Pythonic idiom. Reduces nesting and improves clarity.
decisions.impact: Cleaner and more maintainable Python code following language conventions.

patterns.context: Skip clean PRs early to reduce nesting depth in classification logic
patterns.application: Use continue/return early when conditions don't need processing

patterns.pattern: Extract common calculations to eliminate duplication
patterns.context: Reason calculation was duplicated in 3 branches
Creating CodeQLAlert objects from JSON data
patterns.application: Use list comprehensions when transforming collections in Python

avoidances.antipattern: Array preservation logic in PowerShell simplified incorrectly
avoidances.consequence: Initial simplification broke array handling, causing 5 test failures
avoidances.correction: Preserved ,@($value) pattern for preventing PowerShell array unrolling

avoidances.consequence: Harder to read and debug, violates CLAUDE.md guidance
avoidances.correction: Use explicit if/elif/else statements for multi-case logic

nextSteps: Monitor for edge case issues in production use
Consider extracting PR classification logic to separate testable function
Apply similar simplification patterns to other scripts during future maintenance
